item.title: Install Elasticsearch on Debian and Ubuntu
item.description: Install the official Elastic APT package signing key: wget -qO - https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-algolia | sudo apt-key add - Install the apt-transport-https package, which is required to retrieve deb packages served over HTTPS:
